meanings.definition: The act of presenting or showing for the first time.
meanings.sent1: The premiering of the new movie was a big event in town.
meanings.sent2: The premiering of the school play was a success.
meanings.sent3: Everyone was excited for the premiering of the magic show.
meanings.sent4: The premiering of the art exhibition brought in a large crowd.
meanings.sent5: The premiering of the latest fashion collection was a glamorous affair.

meanings.definition: To debut or introduce something new or important.
meanings.sent1: The band will be premiering their new song at the concert.
meanings.sent2: She will be premiering her latest invention at the science fair.
meanings.sent3: The chef will be premiering his unique dish at the food festival.
meanings.sent4: The author will be premiering her new book at the book signing event.
meanings.sent5: The designer will be premiering the new clothing line at the fashion show.

meanings.definition: To be the first to show or broadcast a film or television program.
meanings.sent1: The TV network will be premiering the new series next week.
meanings.sent2: The cinema will be premiering the highly anticipated movie this Friday.
meanings.sent3: The streaming service will be premiering the documentary on wildlife.
meanings.sent4: The channel will be premiering the live concert on Saturday night.
meanings.sent5: The station will be premiering the investigative report on Monday.
